whoAmI: In 1996-1999, when I was in high school, I worked for an information technology company. Thus, I entered the field of information technologies professionally at a very early age. Afterwards, I completed my education as a Computer Teacher(B.Sc.). and Computer Engineer(M.Sc.). I have worked both in the private sector and in the public sector.

During my years in the private sector, I had significant overseas experience as a software developer. I worked in many countries, especially in Russia. I currently work as a specialist teacher at the Ministry of National Education. Teaching, software development and database management are my important skills.
person.address: 39750 Zafer Dist Büklüm St Lüleburgaz Kırklareli
